text: Ate yahudi kahide hana ki alaha de hatha banhe ho'e hana. Unham de hi hatha banhe jana ate iha gala kahina la'i inham upara lahanata hove. Sagom alaha de covem' hatha khul'he ho'e hana. Uha jisa tar'ham cahuda hai kharaca karada hai ate tuhade ute tuhade raba de valom jihara vi kujha utari'a hai uha unham vicom hi zi'adatara lokam da vidharoha ate unham di avagi'a vadha riha hai. Ate asim unham de vica dusamani ate irakha, ki'amata taka pa diti hai. Jadom kade iha lara'i di aga bhataka'unde hana tam alaha usa nu bujha dida hai. Ate iha dharati upara dage phaila'una de la'i saragarama hana, jadom ki alaha dage phaila'una vali'am nu pasada nahim karada
